channel.title: github on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in github on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Setting up DockerHub
item.description: This tutorial describes how to leverage DockerHub.com to save docker images for AMD64 and ARM32v7.

item.title: Setting up GerritHub
item.description: This tutorial describes how to leverage GerritHub.io for proper code review

item.title: Setting up Travis-CI
item.description: Leverage Travis-CI for automatic build and integration

item.title: Use github repo as helm chart repository
item.description: In order to be able use Helm charts the “normal” way, it is need to buid your own helm repository. The goal of this post is to transform a github repo into a helm repo.

item.title: Setup github/gerrit behind a corporate http proxy
item.description: This is a post of the small set of notes taken to setup gerrit review behind corporate proxy.

item.title: Setup multiple GitHub account on a single machine
item.description: In orderer to manage your personal GitHub projects or an your compagny projects, it is usefull to be able to conigure your .ssh directory.
